nl.tudelft.simulation.dsol.simtime.dist

Class DistContinuousTime<R extends java.lang.Number & java.lang.Comparable<R>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tudelft.simulation.jstats.distributions.Dist
      • nl.tudelft.simulation.dsol.simtime.dist.DistContinuousTime<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - the relative time type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:

extends Dist
